post.text: Tomorrow, we have the chance to stand up for the America we believe in. Share this if you're voting. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Kaitlin
comment.text: This Election is unique for Americans in the sense that, they've put up two candidates. The best ever (most qualified) vs The worse ever (unfit). Congratulations in advance President H. Clinton.

replies.author: Cody
replies.text: FBI cleared hillary and all the baseless allegation on her is no more but donald trump still facing extreme bashing after exposed his character like a play boy and his popularity decreasing day by day,Trump is about to lose the election after hillary is out from all the corruption charges #Ajatrump politics is finished now

replies.text: You want to make the whole country like Detroit? Vote Hillary, the worst most corrupt incompetent running EVER.
